text: Nathan Edward Shaw (born 22 November 2000) is an English professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for AFC Fylde, on loan from Blackpool. ==Career== In 2018, Shaw was part of the Blackpool squad that reached the FA Youth Cup semi-finals. In June 2019, Shaw signed a professional contract with the club. On 3 September 2019, Shaw made his debut for Blackpool in a 5–1 EFL Trophy win against Morecambe. On 19 February 2020, Shaw joined Bamber Bridge on loan for a month."Shaw Loaned To Bamber Bridge" - Blackpool F.C., 19 February 2020 He went out on another loan, this time to AFC Fylde, in October 2020."Nathan Shaw Loaned To Fylde" - Blackpool F.C., 2 October 2020 ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|FA Cup !colspan="2"|EFL Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |Blackpool |2019–20 |League One |0||0||0||0||0||0||1||0||1||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!1!!0!!1!!0 |} ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:English footballers Category:Blackpool F.C. players Category:Bamber Bridge F.C. players Category:A.F.C.
